item.title: Xavier Dolan | In praise of popular art
item.author: Felix Editor,Leo Diaz,
item.description: Xavier Dolan is not your average director. What first sets him apart is that he is extremely young: 28 at the time of writing, he’s already released six full-length features. He directed his first, I Killed My Mother, when he was just 20, and his 2014 Mommy received the Jury Prize at Cannes, along …
